challenge.title: RSA Challenge II: Common Modulas
challenge.author: Subhayan RoyMoulick, Dan Myshkin, Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description:
We have a single message m, that was encrpted, using RSA, and sent to several people. All reciepents have the same RSA modulas N (N=pq). We are however only interested in the message.
Your Objective : Reveal the originial message. (Assume m le N)
